articles.title: Salman Rushdie's 'road to recovery has begun,' author's agent says, as stabbing suspect pleads not guilty
articles.description: The renowned author Salman Rushdie has been taken off a ventilator and continues to recover after being repeatedly stabbed during an on-stage attack in western New York on Friday that left him hospitalized.

articles.author: Samy Magdy
articles.title: Fire at Cairo Coptic church kills 41, including 10 children
articles.description: CAIRO (AP) — A fire ripped through a packed Coptic Orthodox church during morning services in Egypt’s capital on Sunday, quickly filling it with thick black smoke and killing 41 worshippers, including at least 10 children.

articles.title: Trump’s Final Days Draw Scrutiny as Handling of Documents Investigated
articles.description: A rushed and chaotic exit from the White House is at the center of a federal probe that conducted a search of the former president’s Mar-a-Lago resort.
articles.content: A rushed and chaotic exit from the White House is at the center of a federal probe that conducted a search of the former president’s Mar-a-Lago resort.

articles.title: Lt. Gov. Josh Green wins Hawaii Democratic gubernatorial nomination, CNN projects

articles.title: US lawmakers visit Taiwan in unannounced trip on the heels of Nancy Pelosi uproar
articles.description: A group of five U.S. lawmakers landed in Taiwan on Sunday. The group, led by Sen. Ed Markey, D-Mass, will meet with top Taiwanese officials throughout the day.
articles.content:
